item.title: Maggie add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I felt no shame in these activities, because I understood what almost no one else seemed to grasp: that there was only an infinitesimal difference, a difference so small that it barely existed except as a figment of the human imagination, between working in a tall green glass building on Park Avenue and collecting litter in a park. In fact, there may have been no difference at all." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "There are years that ask questions and years that answer." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Maggie add a quote by Meg Rosoff
item.description: "I don't get nearly enough credit in life for the things I manage not to say." -- Meg Rosoff
